Properties.Description: Context integration layer for AI agent communication
Automatically triggers video production based on Google Sheets schedule
Properties.Name: automated-video-pipeline-auto-schedule

Properties.Description: More frequent schedule for high-priority video topics
Properties.Name: automated-video-pipeline-high-priority-schedule

Properties.Description: Usage plan for Video Pipeline API

PrimaryBucketName.Description: Primary S3 bucket for video assets

WorkflowOrchestratorArn.Description: Workflow Orchestrator Lambda ARN (replaces Step Functions)

AutoScheduleRuleArn.Description: EventBridge rule for automatic video production (every 8 hours)

HighPriorityScheduleRuleArn.Description: EventBridge rule for high-priority videos (every 4 hours, disabled by default)

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
